description: New and improved, these classy premium KOMBI heated gloves offer up to 8 hours of extra warmth so you can stay comfy on freezing-cold days. Thanks to heating technology, the heat surrounds the back of the hands, fingers, and thumbs, according to the level of warmth desired. The cozy wool lining and PRIMALOFT® Gold P.U.R.E.™ breathable insulation of these KOMBI ski gloves offer maximum comfort, even when the heating element is not activated. Enjoy going skiing all day long, regardless of the weather!<br><br>The Warm it Up women’s gloves rank 4 on our warmth level scale.
name: Warm It Up Gloves
